title: Seven F1 champions confirmed for 2025 Goodwood Festival of Speed
summary: Prost, Fittipaldi, Stewart, Andretti, Mansell, Häkkinen and Villeneuve will be driving their championship-winning machinery

qa_pairs.question: Which event will feature seven Formula 1 champions showcasing their championship-winning cars in 2025?
Which of the following drivers is NOT among the confirmed seven F1 champions for the 2025 event?
What type of machinery will the seven F1 champions be driving at the Goodwood Festival of Speed?
